title: Market share of streaming devices in the United States 2014
summary: Market buyers bought more Apple_TV than any other Apple_TV in States 2014 , with the device claiming 43 % of the Market .
The top 14 only featured two manufacturers , with Roku and Apple_TV edging out all other manuacturers .
Smart Apple_TV sales in United States is an important Market for manufacturers , with 57 million Market users as of .
gold: The statistic shows a breakdown of the U.S. American streaming devices market according to market share in 2014 . Google 's Chromecast held a market share of 14 percent in 2014 .
